module.p:
coitheanal congregation is a masculine derived common noun, from coitheanail
congregate.

section.p:
The forms of coitheanal are –
indefinite –
nominative singular – coitheanal
dative singular – (ann an) coitheanal
genitive singular – (meud) coitheanail
nominative plural – coitheanalan
dative plural – (ann an) coitheanalan
genitive plural – (meud) choitheanalan
definite –
nominative singular – an coitheanal
dative singular – (anns) a’ choitheanal
genitive singular – (meud) a’ choitheanail
nominative plural – na coitheanalan
dative plural – (anns) na coitheanalan
genitive plural – (meud) nan coitheanalan
